name: Micro Interaction: Twitter Launch Screen and Load New Tweets
description:
Hi there,


This is a file about micro-interaction from Twitter Launch Screen and Load New Tweets that Iâ€™ve recreated as Figma Prototype. To see the animation breakdown, please access the prototype section. There you can see the duration, type of ease, scaling, and transparency that created a delightful interaction.

Twitter logo SVG downloaded from worldvectorlogo.com.


Hope this helps us to learn more about micro-interaction related. If you find anything wrong with this file or the possibility to improve, I'm open to feedback. Hit me up on twitter.com/muyas021


Thank you and enjoy,

Muyas
